name: mern-social-media

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

description: This repo includes a wedding planner app that allows the user to create a guest list and manage RSVPs including meal selctions. Additionally, it allows them to create users for access so that the guestlists can be updated throughout the wedding planning process.
